# All We Need
> The best free developer tools, curated. No ads. Open source.

## Projects
- [Antigravity IDE](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/antigravity-ide): An advanced agentic coding assistant designed by Google Deepmind to solve complex engineering tasks. #ai #coding-assistant #ide
- [Amazon Web Services](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/amazon-web-services): The world's most comprehensive cloud platform, offering a 12-month free tier and always-free services like Lambda and DynamoDB. #cloud-providers #hosting #backend #free-tier #aws
- [Microsoft Azure](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/microsoft-azure): A cloud computing service created by Microsoft, offering free services for building, testing, deploying, and managing applications. #cloud-providers #hosting #backend #free-tier #microsoft
- [Bitbucket](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/bitbucket): Git code management for professional teams, with deep Jira and Trello integration. #source-code-repos #git #atlassian #free-tier
- [Brainboard](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/brainboard): A collaborative solution to visually build and manage cloud infrastructures from end-to-end. #cloud-management #infrastructure #visualization #free-tier
- [cron-job.org](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/cron-joborg): Free external cron job service. Perfect for keeping free-tier services alive. #utilities #devops #automation #free
- [Design Arena](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/design-arena): An AI-powered platform for generating and comparing UI and design concepts. #design #ai #ui-ux
- [DEV Community](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/dev-community): A vibrant, open-source community for software developers to share knowledge, write articles, and grow their careers. #community #blog #developer #learning #open-source
- [Discord](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/discord): The easiest way to talk over voice, video, and text. Talk, chat, hang out, and stay close with your communities. #tools-for-teams #communication #community #free-tier
- [Emailnator](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/emailnator): Generate disposable Gmail-style emails #email #productivity
- [GitHub](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/github): The world's largest AI-powered developer platform to build, scale, and secure software. #source-code-repos #git #collaboration #free-tier #ci-cd
- [GitLab](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/gitlab): A complete DevSecOps platform delivered as a single application, spanning the entire software development lifecycle. #source-code-repos #git #devops #free-tier #ci-cd
- [Google AI Studio](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/google-ai-studio): Googleâ€™s web-based environment for experimenting with and building Gemini-powered AI apps. #ai #llm #google
- [Google Cloud Platform](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/google-cloud-platform): A suite of cloud computing services that provides a generous free tier including App Engine, Cloud Run, and Compute Engine. #cloud-providers #hosting #backend #free-tier #google
- [ImageKit](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/imagekit): A real-time image optimization, transformation, and storage service with a generous forever free tier for developers. #images #cdn #hosting #free-tier #api
- [Kittl PNG to SVG](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/kittl-png-to-svg): Best ever PNG to SVG converter. Unlimited usage. #svg #converter #design
- [LM Arena](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/lm-arena): A platform to compare large language models through blind, side-by-side evaluations. #ai #llm #benchmark
- [Miro](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/miro): A scalable, secure, cross-device, and enterprise-ready collaboration whiteboard for distributed teams. #tools-for-teams #collaboration #whiteboard #free-tier
- [Netlify](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/netlify): An all-in-one platform for building and deploying fast, secure web applications. #hosting #static-sites #deployment
- [Notion](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/notion): The all-in-one workspace for your notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. #tools-for-teams #collaboration #productivity #free-tier
- [OpenRouter](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/openrouter): Unified API gateway that gives developers access to hundreds of LLMs and multimodal models through a single endpoint #api #llm #models #developer #free
- [Oracle Cloud](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/oracle-cloud): Known for the most generous "Always Free" compute offering in the industry, including powerful ARM-based instances. #cloud-providers #hosting #backend #free-tier #oracle
- [Oxaam](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/oxaam): Access shared premium accounts for services like Canva Pro, ChatGPT, and more. #premium #accounts #bypass #utilities #free
- [Postman](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/postman): The industry-standard collaboration platform for API development, testing, and documentation. #api #developer-tools #testing #free-tier
- [Pulumi](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/pulumi): Infrastructure as Code (IaC) platform that lets you create, deploy, and manage infrastructure on any cloud using your favorite languages. #cloud-management #infrastructure #devops #free-tier
- [Railway](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/railway): A developer-focused cloud platform to deploy apps, databases, and services quickly. #cloud #deployment #backend
- [Remove.photos](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/removephotos): A completely free suite of AI tools for image manipulation including BG remover, cleanup, upscaler, and more. No premium features. #images #ai #utilities #converter
- [Render](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/render): A unified cloud platform for deploying web apps, APIs, databases, and background jobs. #cloud #backend #hosting
- [Replit](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/replit): An online IDE and cloud development environment for building and deploying applications. #ide #cloud-dev #collaboration
- [SaveWeb2Zip](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/saveweb2zip): Download entire websites or landing pages as a ZIP archive with all assets (HTML, CSS, JS, Images, Fonts). #utilities #scraper #web-dev #cloner #free
- [SSYouTube](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/ssyoutube): Download YouTube videos in max quality. Free & no ads. #youtube #downloader #video #productivity
- [Temp Mail](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/temp-mail): A disposable email service for quick sign-ups and privacy protection. #privacy #email #utilities
- [ToolFK](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/toolfk): A massive all-in-one developer toolbox featuring compilers, converters, network utilities, and encryption tools. #utilities #developer-tools #compiler #converters
- [Unmute.sh](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/unmutesh): Speak to an AI using Kyutai's new low-latency open-source speech-to-text and text-to-speech models. #ai #speech-to-text #text-to-speech #open-source #audio
- [Unsplash API](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/unsplash-api): The most powerful free image API associated with the world's largest free image library. #api #images #media
- [Vercel](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/vercel): A frontend cloud platform for building, deploying, and scaling modern web applications. #hosting #frontend #deployment
- [Yupp AI](https://allweneed.pages.dev/projects/yupp-ai): A unified interface to compare and use multiple AI models in one place. #ai #productivity #llm


## Contribute
Submit PRs at https://github.com/ghostshanky/allweneed.github.io
